# gestureRecognizers

**Instance Property**

The gesture recognizers that are receiving the press.

## Declaration

```swift
var gestureRecognizers: [UIGestureRecognizer]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The objects held in this array are instances of a subclass of the abstract base class, [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGestureRecognizer]. If there are no gesture recognizers currently receiving the touch objects, this property holds an empty array.

## Getting a press object’s gesture recognizers

- **force**: The force of the button press.
